name: Brick Game Classic Fun
description:
Brick game is the classical and legendary game. I'm sure with you that you had played at least one time when you was child. Maybe Gameboy, maybe NES, maybe PC.
Now, you can return to childhood with Bricks 2019 with modern gameplay, nice art, friendly and familiar sound,...

*Feature:
- 2 mode to play: Classic mode and Time Challenge.
- Leaderboard: get high score and challenge with other players.
- Especially, HOLD button, you can change the brick during playing.
- Full game with no in-app purchase, free at all.
- Pretty graphics and sound.
- Auto save game.

Playing right now!

Visit our Fan page to get more games:
https://www.facebook.com/GNIK.chanel

Have fun.
